item.title: Installing Redmine on Centos 6 Dot 2 Wiht Mysql and Apache
item.author: Antoine Martin
item.description: I needed recently to install the excellent project management tool Redmine on a CentOS 6.2 machine. There are some tutorials on the Web (here or here) but they are a little bit outdated. The following is a method that works as of today.
